name: Samuel (Sam) Otieno
title: Founder & CEO
bio: 12+ years in software delivery and product strategy. Former engineering lead at two scale-ups. Sam leads vision and strategy across all client engagements.

name: Dr. Amina Hassan
title: Head of AI & Data Science
bio: PhD in Machine Learning, experience building NLP systems and production ML platforms. Amina directs all AI and data science initiatives.
image_alt: Dr. Amina Hassan, Head of AI & Data Science

name: Jacob Mwangi
title: Head of Cloud & DevOps
bio: Certified cloud architect with deep experience in Kubernetes and infrastructure automation. Jacob oversees cloud strategy and DevOps excellence.
image_alt: Jacob Mwangi, Head of Cloud & DevOps
